title: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: Bug 4329: No results If searched via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
OB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
EB: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, the expected behavior is to display the search results.
SR: To reproduce the issue, perform a search by selecting a package in the Package view and using the search dialog. Check that no results are displayed.
